author: farhan
title: NUS HAVE MONEY TO GIVE SCHOLARSHIPS TO FOREIGN STUDENTS BUT STILL ASKS FOR DONATIONS FOR NEEDY S'PORE STUDENTS?
text:
All Singapore Stuff - Real Singapore News Advertisement NUS HAVE MONEY TO GIVE SCHOLARSHIPS TO FOREIGN STUDENTS BUT STILL ASKS FOR DONATIONS FOR NEEDY S'PORE STUDENTS?   Advertisement 
<Credits: Yong Lim> 
Received INSULTING LETTER from NUS... WTF...NUS think moi is one of 70% kumgong daft brainless sinkies? DAMN INSULTING MAN! 
KNN, NUS got so much money to give scholarships to thousands of f**king FTs from 3rd world countries, but got no $ to give bursary to needy sinkie students..have to beg from me? 
Lanjiao!...who is NUS trying to bluff? in the end all the donation will still go to sponsor FT's education.... so..NUS...GO FLY KITE LAH! Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
